sentences.english: Double-click the icon to view the contents of the disc.
sentences.chinese: 雙擊該圖標來查看光盤內容。

sentences.english: Double-click the first JLabel to select its display text.
sentences.chinese: 雙擊第一個JLabel以選中其顯示文本。

sentences.english: Instead, the plug-in has its own console, but it does not support double-clicking.
sentences.chinese: 結果，該插件有自己的控制檯，但不支持雙擊。

sentences.english: To open a state for editing, double-click the state.
sentences.chinese: 打開編輯狀態，雙擊狀態。

sentences.english: Double-clicking opens those documents directly from the embedded view.
sentences.chinese: 雙擊這些文檔可以從嵌入視圖直接打開它們。

sentences.english: In the bottom pane, double-click the control.
sentences.chinese: 在右窗格中雙擊該控件。

sentences.english: You can toggle a breakpoint by double-clicking the gray margin beside the line of code.
sentences.chinese: 通過雙擊代碼行旁邊的灰色空白邊，就可以設置斷點。

sentences.english: You can quickly browse to the assets that this asset relates to by double-clicking the relationship.
sentences.chinese: 通過雙擊關係，可以快速瀏覽到與此資產相關的資產。

sentences.english: To jump to a search match, double-click its entry.
sentences.chinese: 若要跳轉到某個搜索匹配項，請雙擊它的項。

sentences.english: For the best view, Please double chlik the pics .
sentences.chinese: 原圖太大，雙擊圖片，縮小觀看，效果最佳。

sentences.english: After the file or folder has been updated, double-click to open it for editing.
sentences.chinese: 在更新文件或文件夾後，雙擊可以將其打開進行編輯。

sentences.english: If you double-click the existing equivalence class, you can rename it.
sentences.chinese: 如果您雙擊已經存在的等價類，您可以重命名它。

sentences.english: After the file or folder is updated, double-click to open it for editing.
sentences.chinese: 在更新文件或文件夾後，雙擊可以將其打開進行編輯。

sentences.english: Navigate through the bookmarks by double-clicking them.
sentences.chinese: 通過雙擊書籤來進行導航。

sentences.english: If any editing is needed, double-left click again.
In an error view, you can double-click an error to display a detailed description.
sentences.chinese: 在錯誤視圖中，可以雙擊某個錯誤以顯示詳細的描述。

definition: to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
